trans-unit.source: Carries error and status information within a SOAP message.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref> class with default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref> class, setting the properties to specified values.
The fault code for the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The fault code identifies the type of the fault that occurred.
The fault string for the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The fault string provides a human readable explanation of the fault.
The URI of the object that generated the fault.
The description of a common language runtime exception.
This information is also present in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault.Detail*> property.
Gets or sets additional information required for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The detail element carries application specific error information related to the `Body` element of a SOAP message.
Additional information required for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
Gets or sets the fault actor for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The FaultActor property provides information about the cause of the fault within the message path.
The fault actor for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
Gets or sets the fault code for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The fault code element provides an algorithmic mechanism to identify the fault.
The fault code for this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
Gets or sets the fault message for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.
The fault string element provides a human readable explanation of the fault and is not intended for algorithmic processing.
The fault message for the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref>.

Populates the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data to serialize the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.SoapFault"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for the current serialization.
